about.title: Who I am?
about.content: Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience building scalable and reliable web applications, with a strong focus on backend development and system integration. Proficient in PHP, JavaScript, and TypeScript, with hands-on experience using Laravel, Symfony, Yii2, React.js, and Vue.js. Experienced in designing RESTful APIs, integrating third-party services, and working with MySQL and PostgreSQL. Familiar with CI/CD pipelines, Dockerized environments, and cloud platforms. A collaborative team player passionate about building maintainable systems and continuously improving technical skills.

skill.title: What skills do I have?
skill.softwareDeveloper: As a Software Developer, I specialize in designing, coding, and maintaining software applications that meet user needs and enhance operational efficiency. My expertise spans various programming languages and frameworks, allowing me to create robust, scalable solutions. I am adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, troubleshoot issues, and implement innovative features. My commitment to best practices in software development, including version control, testing, and documentation, ensures high-quality deliverables. I am passionate about continuous learning and staying updated with industry trends to leverage the latest technologies in my projects.
skill.webDevelopment: As a Web Developer, I focus on creating dynamic and responsive web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. My expertise includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Java, along with frameworks like ReactJS and Spring. I am skilled in both front-end and back-end development, allowing me to build seamless interfaces and robust server-side functionalities. Collaborating closely with designers and clients, I strive to translate requirements into engaging websites that meet business goals. I am passionate about web standards, accessibility, and performance optimization, ensuring that my projects are not only visually appealing but also user-friendly across all devices.

posRetail.title: POS-Retail
posRetail.description: A POS-retail application designed to streamline sales operations and inventory management for convenience stores. The application helps store owners manage their daily operations including sales transactions, product inventory, price lists, and item variants. It integrates with CRM systems for centralized access control and permission management.

socialTool.title: Social Tool
socialTool.description: A middleware platform for managing and scheduling social media posts across Meta and Google channels. The platform enables marketing teams to schedule and publish posts to Meta Business and Google Business platforms, manage social media accounts, and streamline content creation with media management and image editing features. It integrates with CRM systems to manage social account access and permissions for company staff.
